pr_title: Issue 1615 Route53 integration to be able to create custom dns records for the tools

timeline.message: issue #1615 WIP implement possibility to create custom dns records if specified (aws only)
issue #1615 fail run if custom DNS record couldn't be created
issue #1615 do not fail if DNS record already exist when api trying to create it
issue #1615 move removing of DNS records to api server code
issue #1615 fixe to create inc file instead of loc file for all locations with custom dns
issue #1615 fix to correctly fail run if creation of dns record is impossible
issue #1615 do not wait when trying to delete DNS record
issue #1615 create locations for custom dns asynchronously
issue #1615 do not sort locations before process

timeline.bodyText: I think that edge service is running under admin account, so we can add @PreAuthorize(ADMIN_ONLY) here
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: missing final

     public Result<List<NodeDisk>> loadNodeDisks(@PathVariable(value = NAME) final String name) {
         return Result.success(clusterApiService.loadNodeDisks(name));
     }
+
+    @PostMapping("/cluster/dnsrecord")

+            value = "Creates or deletes dns record.",
+            notes = "Creates or deletes dns record.",
